Fix up glyph stroker to avoid buggy rendering. This adds pre-processing to the stroker which removes certain contours that\'d lead to areas wrongly getting not filled. The approach is very simple, but works well enough for most cases.
From uau: libass: Fix cache lookup problem causing memory bloat

Initialize all structs to 0 before using them. This is consistent with the remaining code (which uses e.g. calloc) and makes it easier to extend the structs in the future. As a side effect it fixes several valgrind errors in hashmap_hash/hashmap_key_compare caused by padding in the structures, but it is not a correct fix for that issue.
Fix uninitialized memory access in ass_fontconfig.
Fix clipping for pan-and-scan.
Fix \\be blur start position.
Fix positioned events\' y-position when pan-and-scan is used.
Fix a memory leak.
Fix two gcc warnings.
Fix memory leak produced by the \\blur patch.
increase max glyph and lines limit patch by Scaevolus on irc fixes http://samples.mplayerhq.hu/Matroska/subtitles/090128_gszs02.mkv
Fallback to non-fontconfig behaviour when fontconfig initialization fails. Also fixes a memleak in that case, bug #1313.
libass: fix type mismatch between size parameter and the way it\'s used
Rename font-related preprocessor directives. Switch them from a HAVE_ to a CONFIG_ prefix.
Rename some preprocessor directives from CONFIG_* to HAVE_* where appropriate; CONFIG_ prefix for configurable options, HAVE_ for system-dependent stuff.
Start unifying names of internal preprocessor directives. Replace all USE_ prefixes by CONFIG_ prefixes to indicate options which are configurable.
Fix \\fn without an argument consuming the next \'\\\'.
Fix compilation with FontConfig <= 2.2.96.
Speak of libass instead of MPlayer in the libass license headers. We already use LIBASS_ prefixes for the multiple inclusion guards. Thus libass can be considered separate enough to warrant this.
Fix one more license header wording detail for consistency.
Fix possible free of unallocated memory.
Define FC_FULLNAME and FC_EMBOLDEN to fix compilation with ancient fontconfig.
Fix the second fontconfig_init function as the declaration in the .h file.
Add missing header #includes to fix \'make checkheaders\'.
Some debugging routines.
Consistently give all libass multiple inclusion guards a LIBASS_ prefix.
Fix ass_clear_fonts not deallocating fontdata.
Fix libass to support -nofontconfig. For history reason, fontconfig is auto-enabled when ass is enabled, we keep this behavior and document it clearly.

Our enca code uses strdup() on the input encoding name, as we don\'t modify it we can use the original constant string. Uses less memory, code is simpler and faster. Fixes memory leak (noticed by ulion).
Cosmetics: fix indentation after last commit.
Fix text height calculation. It depends on line spacing.
Fix an obviously incorrect comment.
Fix compilation of ass_fontconfig.c when fontconfig is disabled. Add missing parameter to the function in the #else case
Fix #if condition.
Fix stupid bug in r23229.
In ass_font_new, allocate temporary ass_font_t on stack and return the pointer to cache-owned copy. This fixes leaked ass_font_t struct.
Always deallocate glyphs. Fixes memory leak.
Bugfix: glyph cache depends on border width, because it contains outline_glyph (glyph border obtained with FT_Glyph_StrokeBorder) since r23043.
Fix division by zero in "\
column5:
parsing.
d489827	568ac27	Sat Apr 21 10:56:28 2007 +0000	Always deallocate glyphs. Fixes a memory leak.
59e2832	a629c54	Fri Apr 20 23:09:06 2007 +0000	Oops, fix compilation broken in r23037.
fd5e59d	2e3a283	Fri Apr 13 13:46:49 2007 +0000	Fix a stupid bug in r22473: bbox is zero-filled everytime when a glyph is found in the cache. This leads to broken karaoke (some glyphs are not highlighted at all), and, probably, slightly incorrect linebreaks.
2af2193	761f68b	Sat Apr 7 13:32:51 2007 +0000	Fix lost hard linebreaks in libass by repeating the loop when both soft and hard linebreaks are about to be added.
761f68b	3f202c6	Sun Apr 1 21:59:54 2007 +0000	()" to "(void)" function param list fixes

checkasm: fix aarch64_be architecture: cosmetics: Fix indentation, reorder some lines for consistency.
Fix incorrect spacing introduced in r22231: these two lines were supposed to perform truncation, not rounding.
Bugfix: transform origin to screen coordinates.
Fix \\a parsing broken in r22291
Cosmetics: fix indentation.
\\fn without an argument resets font family to the value from style. Fixes bugzilla #762.
Fix display order of events. Starting time does not matter, it depends on Layer and ReadOrder only.
Fix bounding box calculation with \\fscx/\\fscy.
Fix \\fscx/\\fscy animation.
Move conversions between 16.16, 26.6 fixed point and int, double to separate functions. Some rounding errors are fixed along the way.
Fix \
Bugfix: glyph and bitmap pointers could be left uninitialized after get_glyph(). Based on a patch by Stanislav Maslovski (stanislav d maslovski a gmail d com).
Cosmetics: fix indentation.
Remove a mistakenly committed debug printf.
Get rid on -DGNU_SOURCE for internal code, imported libs should be fixed ASAP, too, though
Fix compilation broken in previous commit.

Fix collision detection. The old method tried to avoid gaps between subtitles by moving the upper subtitle down. This is wrong. With this fix, a subtitle will be moved only if it overlaps with another one.
Partial fix for semitransparent glyph outlines.
Bugfix: when copying ass_force_style_list, ending 0 was left out.
Cosmetics: indentation fix.

Fix the following compiler warnings: ass.c:999: warning: unused variable \'i\' ass.c:1041: warning: pointer targets in assignment differ in signedness ass.c:1043: warning: pointer targets in assignment differ in signedness
Bugfix: sub_recode could deallocate global sub_cp under some circumstances.
Fix width -> orig_width typo.
Fix center of rotation calculation. It was overly complex and incorrect for right- and center-aligned text.
Fix a typo in collision detection code.
Remove an outdated debug message.
Fix crash because of last_glyph < first_glyph, probably caused by first line only consisting of \'\
Better fix_outline implementation. No more "fix_outline failed" messages, should work even with the craziest glyphs.
Fix width -> orig_width typo causing subtitles to be too far to the right for movies with vertical black bars (aspect < monitoraspect).
Cosmetics: fix indentation after last commit.
Fix FT_Stroker use in libass. The previous variant ended up with 0-width outline in some cases.
In r19831, font size multiplier was mistakenly applied to border width. Fixed.
Cosmetics: fix indentation after last commit.
Fix a stupid bug in list concatenation.
Bugfix: timing for empty karaoke words was lost, resulting in faster than normal karaoke playback.
Fix possible unallocated memory read in libass line wrapping code.
Fix last commit.
Bugfix: potential write of unallocated memory.
Bugfix: wrong height value used in font size calculation.
Bugfix: strdup of NULL value.
Fix font scaling taking margins into account.
Cosmetics: fix indentation after r19562.
Fix previous commit.
Fix wrong handling of transparency in \\fad(\\fade).
Cosmetics: fix indentation after the last patch.
Fix compilation with gcc 2.95. Patch by Jason Tackaberry, tack at urandom dot ca.
